column1: How can I create a Recipe?
column2:
To create a Recipe on this community, please follow the steps below:
1. Click on “Recipes” from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Go to “Post a New Recipe” section.
3. Fill the basic details for your Recipe.
4. When you are done, click on “Post Recipe” button to publish your Recipe.

column1: How can I add Photos to my Recipe?
column2:
You can add Photos to your Recipe in one of the following ways:
1. To upload Photos, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the Recipe Profile.    
b. Click “Photos” tab. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Photos”.
c. Click on “Add Photos” link from the top left corner of the “Photos” tab to add a photo.
d. Click the Add Photos link to select the photos from your hard-drive.
e. Once progress bar is completed, click on Save Photos to upload photos to your Recipe.

2. From the “My Recipes” section, click on the “Add Photos” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘e’ in case 1 above.

column1: How can I review a Recipe?
column2:
To review a Recipe, please follow the steps below:
1. Go to the Recipe for which you want to add reviews.
2. Go to the “Reviews” tab for that Recipe.
3. Click on “Post a Review” to write your review.
4. When you are completed with the Review, click on “Post Review” button.

column1: Why am I not able to write reviews for my own Recipe?
column2: Recipe owners are not allowed to write reviews for their own Recipes. If you are a Recipe Owner, then you will not be able to write a review for your own Recipe. Other members on this community can review your Recipe.

column1: Who all can see my Recipe?
column2: You can choose who all can see your Recipe while creating your Recipe, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Recipe” link for your Recipe.

column1: Who all can comment on my Recipe?
column2: You can choose who all can comment your Recipe while creating your Recipe, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Comment Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Recipe” link for your Recipe.

column1: Who all can add Photos to my Recipe?
column2: You can choose who all can add photos to your Recipe while creating your Recipe, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Photo Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Recipe” link for your Recipe.

column1: Who all can add Videos to my Recipe?
column2: You can choose who all can Videos to your Recipe while creating your Recipe, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Video Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Recipe” link for your Recipe.

column1: My problem is not listed above. What should I do now?
column2: If your problem is not listed above, then please contact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site. Let us know your problem and we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
